org.apache.giraph.partition

接口 GraphPartitionerFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex index value
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message value
    所有超级接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
    所有已知实现类:
    HashPartitionerFactory, HashRangePartitionerFactory, RangePartitionerFactory, SimpleIntRangePartitionerFactory, SimpleLongRangePartitionerFactory, SuperstepHashPartitionerFactory

    public interface GraphPartitionerFactory<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable
    Defines the partitioning framework for this application.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MasterGraphPartitioner<I,V,E,M> createMasterGraphPartitioner()
      Create the MasterGraphPartitioner used by the master.
      WorkerGraphPartitioner<I,V,E,M> createWorkerGraphPartitioner()
      Create the WorkerGraphPartitioner used by the worker.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.giraph.conf.ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable

        getConf, setConf

    • 方法详细资料

      • createMasterGraphPartitioner

        MasterGraphPartitioner<I,V,E,M> createMasterGraphPartitioner()
        Create the MasterGraphPartitioner used by the master. Instantiated once by the master and reused.
        返回:
        Instantiated master graph partitioner

      • createWorkerGraphPartitioner

        WorkerGraphPartitioner<I,V,E,M> createWorkerGraphPartitioner()
        Create the WorkerGraphPartitioner used by the worker. Instantiated once by every worker and reused.
        返回:
        Instantiated worker graph partitioner
